## Mission

Build core analytics engine with data aggregation and time-series analysis.

## Branch

`claude/wave4/analytics-core`

## Scope

- Analytics service
- Data aggregation
- Time-series queries
- Analytics dashboard

## Features

1. Win rate analytics
2. Pipeline velocity
3. Revenue forecasting
4. Trend analysis

## Output

`docs/WAVE4_ANALYTICS_CORE_COMPLETE.md`
